articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Air pollution cuts life expectancy by five years in South Asia: EPIC study - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The region accounts for more than half of total life years lost globally to pollution, says the Energy Policy Institute.
articles.content: Rising air pollution can cut life expectancy by more than five years per person in South Asia, one of the worlds most polluted regions, according to a report which flagged the growing burden of hazar… [+1997 chars]
